news.title: Liquid security breach, action suggested

image.dataUri: data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg fill='none' viewBox='0 0 1600 800' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'%3e%3cdefs%3e%3cfilter id='__svg-blur-65a50d8b49642fe8812b4a73f1ca5669'%3e%3cfeGaussianBlur in='SourceGraphic' stdDeviation='40'/%3e%3c/filter%3e%3c/defs%3e%3cimage x='0' y='0' filter='url(%23__svg-blur-65a50d8b49642fe8812b4a73f1ca5669)' width='1600' height='800' xlink:href='data:image/jpeg%3bbase64%%2bMtZLLllzIn0Bdce6J/J%2bulLyRPj482OZyFt5CrH2FCmNERAREQXc3kvYzwMjn1enle1jY/wCeTHL5SGxlgPMuJuj/AIWF0j8j7GKQ%2b212qxInxuiezGx%2bNh39jZJ7IJHdgXVUodEF5B5L2OMzNx8fW6k67Iy5MtuLLjBzIi6qa2iKADWj9Lh3kvZSSiXI1eknlAI5S4nKwWFnYujQPX1%2byoREBERB/9k=' /%3e%3c/svg%3e

news.content:
We have just been informed there has been a security incident at Liquid.com. Although no funds seem to have been affected by the breach, Liquid.com does recommend all customers to change their password and 2FA at their earliest convenience. We strongly recommend anyone having an account on the exchange to do so.

Read the full post on Liquid.com's blog here.
news.excerpt: We have just been informed there has been a security incident at Liquid.com. Although no funds seem to have been affected by the breach, Liquid.com does recommend all customers to change their password and 2FA at their earliest convenience.

previous.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold’s decentralized Grid
previous.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned – both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

next.title: Sharing the November 2020 AMA recording
